title: $330 Million in Crypto Longs Liquidated as Bitcoin Tumbles Below $43,000
description: Bitcoin's upward march over the past month hit a bump in the road Monday morning, with the cryptocurrency's price slipping below $43,000.

title: Exploring the Ripple Effect of BTC Coin in the Crypto Ecosystem
description: As the digital horizon continues to expand, the gravitational pull of Bitcoin, commonly referred to as “BTC coin,” shapes our approach to digital finance. This cryptocurrency behemoth has not only revolutionized the way we perceive monetary value but has also become a linchpin in the crypto ecosystem.. This temporal analysis unveils a pattern where the […]

title: Sony PS5 Pro details and possible reveal date emerge online
description: In recent months, rumors about a PlayStation 5 Pro model have been circulating, and new information has come to light regarding its specifications and potential launch date. While Sony has not officially confirmed the existence of a PS5 Pro, various leaks and sources have provided intriguing details about what could be a powerful addition to ... Read more

title: “The Finals” Dominates the Gaming World with Explosive Free-to-Play FPS Experience
description: The world of online gaming has been electrified by the arrival of “The Finals,” a team-based first-person shooter (FPS) that combines heist-style gameplay with destructible materials, set in a game show environment. With a global player base exceeding 117,000 on Steam alone and peak numbers surging past 242,000 shortly after its launch, “The Finals” has ... Read more

title: Binance’s future in peril: Stark warning from former SEC chief
description: Former Chief of the SEC Office of Internet Enforcement, John Reed Stark, has sounded a stark warning regarding the future of Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange. As regulatory scrutiny and legal challenges intensify, Stark’s concerns are centered around newly unsealed filings from the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ), signaling potentially ominous times for the ... title: BlackRock sounds alarm over Bitcoin’s security classification
description: In a recent update to its exchange-traded fund (ETF) filing, BlackRock, the world’s largest asset manager, has expressed concerns about the possible classification of Bitcoin as a security by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The asset management giant cautioned that such a classification could have far-reaching consequences for the cryptocurrency and its trading ... Read more

title: U.S. agency identified Bitcoin inscriptions as cybersecurity risk
description: The U.S. National Vulnerability Database (NVD) has recognized that BRC-20 standard tokens exploit a vulnerability in the Bitcoin code. According to the official notice, in some versions of the backbone of the network builders, Bitcoin Core and Bitcoin Knots, BRC-20…

title: Crypto Markets Witness Downturn: Ethereum and Altcoins Experience Declines
description:
Reports from a Chinese crypto reporter, Colin Wu, suggest that the crypto market has plunged “sharply” in the past hour. This was indicated by Ethereum falling by more than 4%.  In addition to the Ethereum price drop of 4.9% at press time, several other major cryptocurrencies have reportedly taken a plunge. This includes Flow (FLOW), […]

The post Crypto Markets Witness Downturn: Ethereum and Altcoins Experience Declines appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Big Traders Still Waiting on the Sidelines As Crypto Launches ‘Most Hated Rally,’ According to Meltem Demirors
description:
The chief strategy officer of market intelligence firm CoinShares says that blue-chip traders are still waiting in the wings as crypto launches its “most hated rally.” In a new interview with CNBC Television, CoinShares executive Meltem Demirors says that institutional investors are still waiting on the sidelines along with a lot of retail traders. “There […]
